subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Coach Jim Larranaga, who led George Mason on an improbable trip to the Final Four in 2006, has the No. 5-ranked Miami Hurricanes pointed in that direction as well.
snippet: Coach Jim Larranaga, who led George Mason on an improbable trip to the Final Four in 2006, has the No. 5-ranked Miami Hurricanes pointed in that direction as well.
